website_summaries.verdict: A chewable multivitamin that has a flavor dogs will eat like a treat. Especially helpful for senior dogs.
pros: Includes 34 vitamins and nutrients for common ailments for dogs, including ingredients to help with skin, coat, bone, and teeth health
Contains a chicken liver taste that most dogs like
Works for all ages of dogs, but has particular nutrients for senior dogs
cons: Price is a little high for only 60 chewable tablets
Tablets may be too hard and large for small dogs

customer_reviews.title: Mind Blown.
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away. My dog is 14 years old and was showing it by sleeping all day, losing his eyesite, and started to receive offensive comments like "Look at that old dog! He is so old!" I love my dog and hated hearing that. A week after starting to give him these vitamins, he stopped sleeping all day, out runs/walks me on walks, and today a lady at the dog park thought he was a puppy. I am simply blown away by this product. It makes my heart melt to know that you have added years on to my fur babies life. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one...
customer_reviews.text: My dog was on NaturVet multivitamin and before I ran out, I thought I would give this brand a try. My dog hates it, in fact, neither of my 3 dogs wants to eat it. I put my dog on a multivitamin because I had read that it might help copraphagia to cease. The NaturVet vitamin did cease the habit - today (after about 5 days of using the new vitamin, my dog feasted on her feces today...). She hasn't eaten her feces in months while on the NaturVet, I shouldn't have deviated our product or routine. My fault. Nonetheless, the vitamin is not appealing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kimmer

customer_reviews.title: My finicky dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: I have a chihuahua/jack russell mix dog who turns his nose up at almost all treats (except a few of the freeze dried meats, and only a few). He won't eat most dog foods from the cheapest to the highest quality organic, no grain. He will starve for days before eating a nibble. But he loves these vitamins. I break them into a few pieces with my fingers and he laps them from my hand. They are his new treat and I am grateful because right now all he'll eat is roasted chicken thigh, so I'm glad to fortify him with some vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: K.T.Lange

customer_reviews.title: Probably great but dogs won’t touch them so 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: None of the SIX dogs I tried to give these to would eat them?! So overall a loss for me, very disappointed as they looked to be a good value with good ingredients. However that doesn’t matter if you can’t get your dog to take them! Note I do NOT have picky dogs, ones nick name is Belly because she’ll eat just about anything...
customer_reviews.author: Camille B.

customer_reviews.title: Thought these were soft chews
customer_reviews.text: Bought these thinking they were soft chews from the “chewable” part in the description but they are very much hard tablets. They’re also very large. I bought these for my sick 7 pound dog and I had to break it in half for him to even try and swallow it. And since he’s. A senior he HATES hard treats. Just gave up on giving them to him.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia B.

customer_reviews.title: good reviews and we decided to try them
customer_reviews.text: Our little guy is a senior dog now and although there are plenty of dog foods out there for senior dogs he is extremely allergic to grains and bone meals. We tried giving him senior dog food with all of the vitamins he needs because of his age however his allergies were rampant. We put him back on his meaty dog food and opted for vitamins. I did some research and found these, good reviews and we decided to try them. It has only been a couple of days and he is recovering from knee surgery however we are optimistic. Update: we had to return these because the chicken liver base was making him itch like crazy.....
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lutt

customer_reviews.title: Gave both my dogs diarrhea :(
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately both my dogs (chiweenie 16lbs & Yorkeenie 15lbs) got severe diarrhea bc of these. First time gave one as instructed based on the label, thought it was a fluke and blamed it on something they might have eaten. By the 4th time giving them these vitamins, they were leaving runny surprises all over the house. Perhaps my dogs are more sensitive to the nutmeg? Maybe it'll work for someone else but not my pups...
customer_reviews.author: Maria Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Love these vitamins!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our senior dog was having all kinds of health problems. He was leaking in his sleep and leaving puddles of pee where he slept and was also suffering from inflammatory bowel disease so he was on prednisone daily. We started giving him these vitamins and his health has literally transformed. He is way more energetic and happy, he's stopped leaking and we've stopped giving him prednisone. I'm not saying these vitamins cured him, I'm just saying that his health has transformed since we started giving them to our dog. I would highly recommend these to anyone with a senior dog.
customer_reviews.author: B. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: a mixed answer.  Good and Bad results on different dogs.
customer_reviews.text: We have two little dogs. One is a white Bischon, the other is a mixed color Lasa Apso. They are about the same size. The Bischon thrives on the Buddy and Lola Dog Vitamins, but the Lasa Apso got very ill and barfed up several times on three days after the same vitamins. We had to stop giving the Lasa Apso your vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Writer

customer_reviews.title: Price per tablet has increased
customer_reviews.text: I used to get the bottle with 180 tablets for $25. Why do these new bottles contain only 60 tablets at $14? These come out to $0.23 vs $0.138/tablet. And yet the advertising appears like the savings is based on the original price when we are only getting 60 tablets. Quite misleading in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Ann

customer_reviews.title: like most things that are good for you, these apparently don't taste good
customer_reviews.text: One dog will eat them the other won't touch them. Neither are picky eaters, but they don't seem to like the taste of these much. They don't have a dog treat smell when you open the bottle, so I'm not shocked. for the price it was worth a try! After a couple of weeks I lowered my rating from three stars to two, since after a few days neither of my dogs wanted anything to do with these and I threw two thirds of them away.
customer_reviews.author: picky

customer_reviews.title: My dog has recently undergone surgery to remove mammary gland ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has recently undergone surgery to remove mammary gland tumors testing positive for cancer. We are doing everything in our power to improve her immune system. We started her on Buddy Lola vitamins. I have noticed that she is extremely playful and has an abundance of energy. She still does not take them without disguise but we have been crushing them up in her food. She is 10 years old and I do believe the vitamins have made her feel very youthful and she is healing extremely quick. I am very thankful for this product and for the reviews that prompted me to purchase them. I will be keeping her on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The dog takes it out of my hand
customer_reviews.text: This is the first vitamin the dog actually eats out of my hand. I personally cannot say anything about the taste because I did not taste it. But if the dog is actually eating it out of my hand she must love it!
customer_reviews.author: FavaHouse

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I have a large mixed breed dog that is nearly 12 years old. I got these vitamins after she appeared to have a stroke. I feed her high quality food but thought that might not be enough. In only a short time, I have seen an improvement in her energy level, and it seems that she truly feels better. I highly recommend these vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: C. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: not  at this size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the one that comes in a plastic pouch some vitamins came broken. I notice my dogs appetite increase somehow. recommended but not in the pouch version .
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes the taste.
customer_reviews.text: First of all,my dog loves it. I simply break the chew in half and put it on his food. I am sure he would take the chew right from my hand too. He seems to have gotten some of his old energy back after coming off of a very nasty episode of pancreatitis. I am happy with his progress so far. I make homemade food for him so this gives me some peace of mind about getting the right vitamins and minerals into him.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: My dog wouldn't eat them
customer_reviews.text: These are probably fine vitamins, but my dog wouldn't eat them. I still have to wrap them in liverwurst like I do when I give her a pill.
customer_reviews.author: Shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: A good all in one mutivitamin for my small dogs
customer_reviews.text: They dont really like the taste of them but they are quite picky so I just break them in half and they take them.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Eats it straight from the bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Flavor must be good because he eats its straight from the bottle. I do not have to mixed it in with his dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Buyer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs actually like it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are really picky about pills but eat these in their bowl mixed with food just find

customer_reviews.title: Liam loves them
customer_reviews.text: Liam loves his vitamins. We love the Buddy and Lola Company. They have great products.
customer_reviews.author: Liam's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help my old dog
customer_reviews.text: I have an old dog with dementia they seem to help but he’s so picky sometimes it’s hard to get them down him
customer_reviews.author: Nana Smalls

customer_reviews.title: My dog is a huge fan!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to supplement my dog's diet. She's 9 years old, healthy, and on a good diet, but I figured it couldn't hurt. She loves the flavor and begs, pushes, tries anything to get more than her 1 piece a day.

customer_reviews.title: Not what i thought I was getting
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was suppose to be a chewable vitamin, she is only a little over 6 months old & it’s to big to give her, afraid she will choke on it. Can I return this product for a full refund? Thanks Carol Moore
customer_reviews.author: carol moore

customer_reviews.title: Good for your dog. Pooch approved!

customer_reviews.title: Taste is not the best

customer_reviews.title: ... seniors- they are both taking the multi vitamins and love them. I’m glad I purchased these

customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: She does like the treat ones from this company but I was ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog who will eat anything would gag every time I came near her with these. Even covering the pill in peanut butter did nothing. Her previous multivitamins she would take without anything just chew the pill and be done. She does like the treat ones from this company but I was bummed about these considering it’s way more for the same price the treat ones are.
customer_reviews.author: aubrey miller

customer_reviews.title: Born Again Dog
customer_reviews.text: Its been about a week since my dog have been on these vitamins. His energy level is much more vibrant and he seems so much energized, like when he was a pup. Not to mention his doggie fur is soo much healthier, fluffier and youthful. Im really glad I looked into these vitamins prior to getting them he seemed to be very lazy, lagging around the house and sleeping alot. Very happy with the outcome. By the way I put a vitamin in his treat which he eats with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: Our Scotties eat their daily vitamin like a treat
customer_reviews.text: Our Scotties eat their daily vitamin like a treat. We’ve noticed a difference in their alertness and less itchiness.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in timely manner. Dog is doing OK with ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in timely manner. Dog is doing OK with them. Not sure what to say since this is a long term use product and he hasn't been taking them that long.

customer_reviews.title: Dog eats them right up!
customer_reviews.text: Give my dog 2 a day to make sure she’s getting the essential vitamins she needs. She eats homemade dog food, and these vitamins go great with her daily meals.

customer_reviews.title: I just started using them with my new rehomed Corgi ...
customer_reviews.text: I just started using them with my new rehomed Corgi. It's hard to tell at this point if I see any changes, but the ingredients are very beneficial.

customer_reviews.title: ... and a week and half later she is a happy dog. The vitamins are the real deal
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a skin problem started her on these vitamins and a week and half later she is a happy dog. The vitamins are the real deal.

I do wish they came in a bigger count bottle though because having two dogs taking 2 a day each goes fast.

customer_reviews.text: My senior dog does not seem to like it; although my young doggie takes it like a treat.

customer_reviews.text: My guy needs a good multi vitamin because I make his dog food and he loves these, he is a 9 year old lab mix and his coat looks amazing.

customer_reviews.title: They  think  it's  a treat
customer_reviews.text: They love the taste so far. We haven't been using long enough to notice any other difference.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My little dog hates taking pills and he absolutely loves his Buddy and Lola multivitamin.

customer_reviews.title: Picky dog approved
customer_reviews.text: My SUPER picky dog loves these! I give her one a day as a treat and she's more than happy to have it.

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in them
customer_reviews.text: These did not agree with my dog. I am very disappointed in them. Have gone back to ones I used before.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Too early to tell
customer_reviews.text: My senior Westie...started having hip and joint pain in her real leg and was not putting weight on it but was caring it and limping. She has only been on this vote man along with a joint supplement for a little over a week now. She appears to be improving
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good experience
customer_reviews.text: works great! My dog has an allergy to something in dry food. She can eat anything (meat, cheese, cooked vegetables, bread, peanut butter), you name it, no problem. But her stomach goes haywire immediately when she eats dryfood. I have her on a diet of rice, meat and occasionally some table food. I added these vitamins for a balanced diet. So far so good. 65lb dog, I give her one a day. I throw them on her food and they are gone after she eats her meal. 5 star experience for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, But I Do Recommend It
customer_reviews.text: I recently started cooking my dog's food and wanted these to help supplement her meals. The bottle was fresh, the pills are easy to break in half and feed, but it just didn't work for us. The vitamins caused constant anal gland leakage! I don't think it's a bad product, but I think my dog can't process synthetic vitamins. I'll be supplementing with all natural products from now on. But if it works for you, it's a good product for the price. You won't find any other daily supplement with as much vitamins and a low dose. Some of the other brands will have you giving your dog more pills with less vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: S. PatrickTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: My senior beagle was not putting weight on despite being fed well balanced cooked food, omega 3 supplements, the works. My vet told me he needed to take a multivitamin and I found Buddy & Lola. After a couple of weeks, he slowly started to show some improvement. He is still skinny as he is very old but looking better, perkier. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sunny loves these!
customer_reviews.text: The two things that sold us at first glance: Made in USA and headquartered in Portland OR, the area we live in. So far Sunny, our 14 year old golden retriever, has no problem scarfing down the vitamins. One thing we did notice was she got hyper after taking the second vitamin early evening. She is on phenobarbital for minor seizures, and after looking up side effects of choline, we decided to only give her one in the morning. Everything is back to her normal, so it's all good. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: D. Wingate

customer_reviews.title: Certainly worth trying for better canine health
customer_reviews.text: I like providing better nourishment for our pair of 14-year-old dogs but have had to crush the pills because they won't eat them intact. After about 10 days the benefit became apparent as both of our older dogs became more active and, perhaps less positively, noisy! But I consider their barking to be a sign of greater vitality, a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Contains nutmeg
customer_reviews.text: Gave 3 out of my 4 dogs diarrhea. All over the house. Tried it again just in case it was a fluke....poop everywhere again! Saw some other reviews on this and apparently, nutmeg is very toxic....why put that in your product? That's what you get for being "low price" vitamin I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Gin256

customer_reviews.title: My 17yr old Bichon Frise enjoys these.
customer_reviews.text: Molly our Vision turned 17yrs old on August 2016...she had started eating my house plant dirt a few months before that. She even showed our purse bunny MuuMuu how to get to my indoor rose plants. I looked on the AKC website and it said she may need missing minerals added to her diet. She has not eaten any of my house plants or dirt since taking these supplements. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Morgan deVries

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: My dog will swallow this vitamin like a treat! So I'll presume the taste is good. He's acting like a young dog!!! He's 8 and huge.
customer_reviews.author: WMH

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t share proper review
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t give a better review because my best friend,Levi, passed away suddenly. Rest In Peace bubby.

customer_reviews.title: Good Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I break them in half and put them in her food. She had a tremor in her front leg which seems to be better. Not sure if vitamins are helping, but they are not hurting . Will keep giving them to her.

customer_reviews.title: Picky Dog & Happy Owner Approved!!!

Not only has his appetite improved, he's back to playing like a puppy and he's 10 1/2! I'd highly recommend these vitamins and I know I won't hesitate to reorder.

customer_reviews.author: MARINA

customer_reviews.title: Good multivitamin with all the supplements I was looking for.  I wish it was available in a soft chew though.
customer_reviews.text: I have just started making my own dog food and was looking for a multivitamin with calcium to supplement the homemade food. This multivitamin is just what I was looking for. I do have to grind them up in a pill crusher because my older dogs do not like to eat hard treats. I do wish this vitamin was available in a soft chew version. That would be perfect for my pets. They are fussy eaters but do not turn their nose up at their food when I sprinkle this vitamin on it like they have with many other products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY dog is very picky about taste and she absolutely loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Klisz

customer_reviews.title: The Pups like it.
customer_reviews.text: My pups like this one...the liver flavoring is appealing to them. Seems like a high-quality product. I feel good giving it to them. One tiny complaint: The print on the label is so tiny that I couldn't read it and had to email the owners for info. Good news: The owners are accessible to help out their customers.
customer_reviews.author: kimme + roger

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love ❤️ it
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery 📦 good product my dogs happily chew it up
customer_reviews.author: huntressnb

customer_reviews.title: Great dog vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: Great vitamins! Even my finicky eater Havanese now gobbles them up without the aid of peanut butter. Buddy & Lola vitamins really do seem to help my dogs with their skin, coats & energy. I originally got my dogs these vitamins because of the good reviews & because I've had to change my dog's diets. I wanted to ensure my dogs' nutrition was still excellent. The only drawback is that these vitamins are difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly A.

customer_reviews.title: Approved by my dog : )
customer_reviews.text: My dos loves them, and they seem to work for him. I will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: LSS

customer_reviews.title: It seems like a very nice
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a very nice, balanced, formula. One dog will eat it and one won't. My border terrier / poodle mix will not eat it. She won't eat it out of hand and if I put it in her food she eats around it. If I crush it and put it in her food she refuses the food entirely. My other, large, dog will eat them just fine and actually seems to have more energy with them. I'm so tired of trying to find a tasty enough vitamin that my dog will eat!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never used them before, only given a few so far. No alergic reactions.
customer_reviews.author: bird_dog95035

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely seeing more energy in my pooch since giving these.
customer_reviews.author: Sensasianl

product_meta.title: Buddy & Lola Multivitamin for Dogs – Advanced Daily Supplements to Improve Dog Health - Multivitamins, Nutrients, Calcium, Digestive Enzymes & Antioxidants – Chicken Liver Taste Chewable Tablets
feature_bullets: TRANSFORM YOUR DOG’S HEALH WITH OUR BEST NUTRITIONAL SUPPLEMENT: Multivit+ is a proven dietary supplement for active, working, older dogs or puppies. It has been specially designed to keep your dog’s bones, nails, joints and teeth strong and healthy. What's more, it will make your best friend's coat shiny, skin healthy and promote wellness in their digestive system & improved canine immune system

SEE THE DIFFERNCE IN YOUR SENIOR DOG: Buddy & Lola’s Multivitamin will give your aging dog all the support they need in later life. Containing over 34 essential nutrients, enzyme & zinc to help improve your dog’s wellbeing and promote health in your dog’s senior years. Many of our customers comment on seeing increased energy levels and improved appetite in their dogs as a direct result of them taking our best-selling dog health supplement.

YOUR DOGS WILL LOVE OUR YUMMY CHICKEN LIVER FLAVORED CHEWABLE TABS: These vitamin and mineral chew bites for dogs feature an amazing chicken liver taste your dog will absolutely love. You can easily feed them to your dog as treats or you can crumble and mix them into the food you serve them on a daily basis to boost immunity, heart health, joint & hip mobility.

34 VITAL NUTRIENTS: RICH VITAMIN, NUTRIENTS AND CALCIUM FORMULA - SOY & DAIRY FREE: Multivit+ by Buddy & Lola is the ultimate dietary source of essential minerals, vitamins, calcium, digestive enzymes (lipase and protease) and antioxidants (bromelain and pepsin) for your furry friend. This premium quality health supplement has been manufactured in the USA and it contains all-natural, 100% safe ingredients and are made of the highest quality ingredients.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Providing you with the friendliest pet parent relations is our number one goal. This is why we offer you a 100% satisfaction guarantee in case our dog health supplement does not live up to your expectations (we hope this won’t be the case). Feel free to contact us and we will happily address any issues you may have! Looking to order a larger quantity? Want to save $$’s? Go large with our 180-count which means you’ll get the equivalent of a 60-count bottle FREE!
